snippet.textDisplay:
KOREAN'S PLAGIARISM AND THEFT OF CHINESE CULTURE

-Architecture, Inventions
Taoist Yin Yang symbol - Taeguki flag
Tang, Ming Dynasty architecture
Chopstick - Metal Chopstick
Chinese block printing
Paper
Ink & brush
Fireworks

Ideology, literature, societal structure
-Confucianism - the basis of Korean culture
-Chinese political and governmental system
-Chinese characters - Hanja, and its 2000 pronunciations

-Food, Cuisine, Beverage
Rice irrigation techniques
Soy sauce
Rice wine - Soju
Zhajiangmien - Jajangmyeon
Ramen - Ramyeon
Chinese glass noodles - Japchae
Jiaozi Chinese dumpling - Mandu
Chinese Sweet and Sour pork/fish - Tangsuyuk
Chinese Fried Rice - Kimchi fried rice
Fermented Napa cabbage - Kimchi
Chinese Ginseng - Korean Ginseng
Renshen jitang - Samgye-tang
San Choy Bow - Ssam

-Territory
Gaoguli - Goguryo
Changbai Mountain - Paektu Mountain

-Attire, China, wares
Hanfu - Hanbok
Chinese knot - Korean knot
Chinese Porcelain
Chinese Silk

-Medicine
Acupuncture
Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) - Korean TM

-Festivals
Dragon Boat Festival - Korean Dragon Boat Festival
Chinese Lunar New year - Korean Lunar new year
Chinese Lantern Festival - Korean Lantern Festival
Mid Autumn Festival - Chuseok

-Film and Media
Over 80 copycat of Chinese historical dramas
Copycat Chinese music

-Mythologies, folklore, astronomy
Nine tailed fox - Kumiho fox mythology
12 Zodiacs - Korean Zodiac
Chinese Almanac - Korean Almanac
Chinese astrology

*BONUS
Japan
Sushi - Kimbap
Samurai - Saulbi
Katana blade - Hwando
Karate - Taekwando
Aikido - Hapkido
Taiyaki - Bungeoppang
Ninja - Chosun Ninja/Hwarang
J-Pop - K-Pop
Honda emblem - Hyundai emblem
Oogui - Mukbang
Fight Oh slang - Fighting
Japanese blood type personality - Korean blood type personality
Over 60 copycat of Japanese variety shows and dramas
Hundreds of copycat Japanese electronics, manga, anime, toys, snacks and beverages

West
Pop music - K-Pop
KFC - Korean Fried Chicken
Pancake - Korean pancake
Southern BBQ - Korean BBQ
